allow:
Bash(git merge feature/v1.0.0-upgrade --no-ff -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge branch ''feature/v1.0.0-upgrade'' into main

Release v1.0.1 - Complete game implementation with bug fixes

Major Features:
- Infinite procedurally generated levels
- 4 difficulty levels \(Easy, Normal, Hard, Expert\)
- Countdown timer challenge
- Move counter and scoring system
- Particle effects and animations
- Sound effects and background music
- Debug mode toggle \(F3/D key or HUD button\)

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed HUD flickering issue
- Fixed keyboard shortcuts not working
- Improved logging system with timestamps
- Optimized rendering performance
- Debug mode now defaults to OFF

Technical Improvements:
- Self-contained executable packaging
- Comprehensive documentation
- Automated release scripts
- Package verification tools

Release Package:
- File: CircuitRepairGame-v1.0.1-win64.zip
- Size: 24.3 MB
- SHA256: 2756953f79ee1283e336d40b927ecb65f4255cb7891d845e31348e959c362642

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
